}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *''Fortinet Homepage'' - [https://www.fortinet.com/ Link] *''Senao International Co., Ltd. Homepage'' - [https://www.senao.com.tw/ Link]
The ''Fortinet EMP7618'' is the internal half Mini-PCI wireless card used in the FortiWifi 40C. :It is based off the [[Atheros AR5BHB116]] reference design. :According to Amazon this item first appeared on 11/14/2011 on their site.
It has 2 Model Numbers EMP7816 and EMP7816-RF both were filed with the FCC and IC at the same time. :Fortinet part number for this item is 5816A0540000 as shown on removed card. :[[Senao]] International's part number for this item is 1101A0124302 per FCC Filing.
